SYN_015_0_3:
PROCEDURE CODES JUSTIFICATION:
1. 31641 (Tumor Destruction): Extensive APC thermal ablation and mechanical shaving performed on proximal Left Mainstem tumor to relieve 80% obstruction.
2. 31631 (Stent Placement, Tracheal/Carinal): Deployment of Silicone Y-stent (tracheal, right, and left limbs) to treat carinal fistula and extrinsic compression. 
Note: Biopsy (31625) performed but bundled. Rigid bronchoscopy utilized for stent delivery.
